description: Led the full lifecycle development of multiple Java/TypeScript backend APIs to migrate customer eligibility flags for a deprecation campaign, alleviating an operational burden on the team since 2022.
Designed low-level architecture and developed unit tests for the aforementioned migration process to ensure robust and reliable implementation.
Developed and implemented automated pipelines for OS patching, significantly reducing manual effort for patching over 20 non-operational hosts managed by the team.
